title: HAPPYSWIMMING
subtitle: providing swimming services
aboutIntro: We provide swimming lessons to all levels with the aim of introducing the numerous opportunities that water offers. For us, swimming is much more than achieving a skill for life. We use swimming as a tool to enhance child development and build a child's personality.
aboutMethodology: Young children learn through our cross innovative 'swim a story' methodology that offers an interdisciplinary approach to learning to swim.
aboutPhilosophy: Our philosophy is based on the enjoyment of the children from day one and fear can often be an obstacle at early ages, and it is for this reason that being aware of children's psychology is essential to make learners feel confident and happy in the water.
aboutAdults: We apply the same philosophy to adults and we adapt to their motor skills for a quicker progress.

descriptions.children36: For beginners and children already familiarized with the water, to learn the fundamental water skills that will keep them safe in the water
descriptions.children612: For confident children with ability start learning the basis of the strokes that will lead to confident swimmers, through fun and play
descriptions.anyAge: From complete beginner to confident swimmers that want to improve technique

abilities.0: They cannot put my head under water, nor control my breathing
abilities.1: They can put my head under water and blow bubbles through nose or mouth
abilities.2: They can put my head under water and blow bubbles while floating on front and back
abilities.3: They can move in water on front and back with arm and leg movements without breathing control
abilities.4: They can do a 360-degree turn on my longitudinal axis
abilities.5: They can do a somersault in the water
abilities.6: They need to improve my front crawl technique
abilities.7: They want to improve my technique in all strokes with turns
